Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 12 Kilesagocchaka » 12.1 Kilesaduka » 12.1.1 Paṭiccavāra » 12.1.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 12.1.1.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Kilesagocchaka
Kilesaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
9.
3832Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
<< 12.1.1.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup12.1.1.3--4 Paccayānulomapaccanīya-paccayapaccanīyānuloma >>
